name: Wedding Fight
description:
You are one of the guests at the wedding reception, and the bride is about to make the ritual of throwing the bouquet. A new opportunity to be blessed by the bride is open to you. But you are not alone: there are a lot of guests who are also eager to catch it. Now, it's time to compete for it. But be aware! Even if you catch it, you'll have to fight for it, because they can take it from you!

Enjoy it!

GGJ Webpage: http://globalgamejam.org/2016/games/wedding-fight

Made in Love2D

Game Design

  • Odin Campoy
  • Esther Paez

Programming

  • Francisco Moyano
  • Manuela Ruiz
  • Juan Delgado

Art design

  • Mayte Baena

Sound

  • Oliver Moya
